title: Classifier Design Simulation Course Based on Ensemble Learning Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic machine learning concepts and classifier architectures
context.additional_context: A process for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to learn classifier optimization strategies through hands-on practice in a VR environment

learning_goals: Ability to design classifier selection indicators by applying the principle of knowledge granulation.
Ability to construct ensemble models using adaptive strategies across diverse classifier spaces.
A classification decision system can be implemented in a simulation environment, considering computational efficiency.
Project deliverables can be submitted that evaluate generalization performance when applied to real-world problems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
